name: HNB Teen Account
details: From aspirations to achievement Open an HNB Teen Account today and let your teenagers discover the benefits of saving. What benefits we can give you? HNB Diri Daru Scholarships for Grade five, O/L, A/L & for special achievements Benefits offered for HNB Teen account Account Balance Gift Voucher Value Rs. 100,000/- Rs. 5,000/- Rs. 250,000/- Rs. 10,000/- Rs. 500,000/- Rs. 20,000/-
